name: Tetris Pro (itch) (HKfactorial)
description:
By embracing our universal desire to create order out of chaos, the Tetris game provide intellectual sport that combine continuous fun with mental stimulation.

As one of the most recognizable and influential video game in the world, it's no wonder there are hundreds of millions of Tetris products being played, worn and enjoyed by fans in their everyday lives. For thirty years the game have truly transcended the barrier of culture and language, resulting in a fun  exciting playing experience for everyone, everywhere!

HOW TO PLAY?

The Tetris requires player to strategically rotate, move and drop procession of  Tetrominos that fall into the rectangular matrix at increasing speeds. 

Player attempt to clear as many line as possible by completing horizontal rows of blocks without empty space, but if the Tetrominos surpass the skyline the game is over! It might sound simple, but strategy and speed can go a long way!

Are YOU up for the challenge?

CONTROLS: WINDOWS:
  • Move Left:          "LEFT ARROW" Key       ---   "A" Key
  • Move Right:       "RIGHT ARROW" Key   ---   "D" Key
  • Rotate:                 "UP ARROW" Key            ---   "W" Key
  • Move down:      "DOWN ARROW" Key  ---   "S" Key
  • Hold:                     "SHIFT" Key
  • Instant Drop:   "SPACE" Key

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ANDROID:
  • Move Left:          SWIPE LEFT
  • Move Right:       SWIPE RIGHT
  • Rotate:                 SWIPE UP
  • Move down:      SWIPE & HOLD DOWN
  • Hold:                     HOLD UI BUTTON
  • Instant Drop:   DROP UI BUTTON
